Uses of Package
btrplace.plan

  • Packages that use btrplace.plan 
    Package Description
    btrplace.json.plan
    Converters for a plan and its sub-components.
    btrplace.model.constraint
    Concrete implementation of SatConstraint.
    btrplace.plan
    Basic API to specify a ReconfigurationPlan.
    btrplace.solver
    API to define a ReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    btrplace.solver.choco
    Choco implementation of a ReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    btrplace.solver.choco.runner
    A package dedicated to the different solving methods.
    btrplace.solver.choco.transition
    Different classes to model the possible state transitions for a VM or a node.
    btrplace.solver.choco.view
    Choco implementation of the model views.
  • Classes in btrplace.plan used by btrplace.json.plan 
    Class and Description
    ReconfigurationPlan
    A reconfiguration plan is a set of actions to execute to reconfigure an infrastructure starting from a given model.
  • Classes in btrplace.plan used by btrplace.model.constraint 
    Class and Description
    ReconfigurationPlan
    A reconfiguration plan is a set of actions to execute to reconfigure an infrastructure starting from a given model.
  • Classes in btrplace.plan used by btrplace.plan 
    Class and Description
    DefaultPlanApplier
    A skeleton for ReconfigurationPlanApplier.
    ReconfigurationPlan
    A reconfiguration plan is a set of actions to execute to reconfigure an infrastructure starting from a given model.
    ReconfigurationPlanApplier
    An object to simulate the application of a plan.
    ReconfigurationPlanCheckerException
    Exception that notifies a constraint violation inside a reconfiguration plan.
    ReconfigurationPlanMonitor
    This allows to monitor the execution of a reconfiguration plan while considering the dependencies between the actions that are established in a ReconfigurationPlan.
  • Classes in btrplace.plan used by btrplace.solver 
    Class and Description
    ReconfigurationPlan
    A reconfiguration plan is a set of actions to execute to reconfigure an infrastructure starting from a given model.
  • Classes in btrplace.plan used by btrplace.solver.choco
